text.div:
This code system http://ga4gh-cp.github.io/pedigree-fhir-ig/CodeSystem/LifeStatus defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
alive Alive
deceased Deceased
unborn Unborn

name: LifeStatus
title: Life Status
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health - Clinical and Phenotypic Data Capture Work Stream

contact.name: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health - Clinical and Phenotypic Data Capture Work Stream

description: The presumed/accepted life status of the individual as of the pedigree collection date; one of: alive, deceased, unborn.
